data.message: I keep editing my brain to stop posting comments on the internet. But my Facebook happy phone keeps redirecting my thumbs to..   Shall i say. Do dumb things. So ya. My thumbs want me to offer to buy you a burger. Because my heart says this guy needs a burger and someone to pay for his meal. But like. Im not going to post this. Because. I am completely not weird. And my Facebook happy phone never wins because i literally control it. So. Again. Ignore me. Because. I am sane. And didn't actually press post after this just because i want to. And i never do anything i want.
